title: Aaron Yim, Author at Visual Studio Blog - devblogs.microsoft.com
snippet: Aaron Yim Product Manager, AI Experiences Aaron is a Product Manager on the Visual Studio IDE team, where he's been working on AI assisted developer tools like GitHub Copilot Chat and IntelliCode. He's pioneered interfaces that are now industry standard, such as the inline-diff view, copy-paste-update automation, and most recently, Agentic ...
